scripts.build_mathjax: git clone https://github.com/mathjax/MathJax-src.git mathjax; cd mathjax; npm install; npm run compile; npm run make-components
scripts.build_mathjax_for_debug: git clone https://github.com/mathjax/MathJax-src.git mathjax; cd mathjax; npm install; npm install --save source-map-support; gsed -i 's/module.exports = PACKAGE;/module.exports = function (name, mathjax, libs, dir, dist) { const config = PACKAGE(name, mathjax, libs, dir, dist); config["devtool"] = "inline-source-map"; return config };/' components/webpack.common.js; npm run compile; npm run make-components
scripts.build: [ ! -d "./mathjax" ] && npm run build_mathjax; cd src; node ../mathjax/components/bin/makeAll
